name: Halloween Alien Game
description:
GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED (can work with keyboard and mouse I think lol? use WASD for movement, Mouse for camera controls and m1/m2 for actions)

Download and unzip, launch "HalloweenAlienGame.exe"

Short level design project I started that quickly spiraled out of control. There may be bugs, but there is also a cool game to play! Happy Halloween!

Some content provided by https://freesound.org/ 

Developed in Unity Engine

Assets used: Cinemachine, ProBuilder, Playmaker, UMotionPro
